item.title: Host This Website in 2020
item.description: Some call this year 2020 is depressing. Let’s change that tone by do something new. Motivation Well, that was pretty good motivation already. Okay, here is what happened, I have been living under the rock in the past years, and I come out and see the world is moving to JAM-Stack. In a nutshell, a static site that hosted on CDN. It provides speed (no backend logic) and security (less attacking surface).
